* Added support for Code Integrity Event ID 3114 (generated by Dynamic Code Security) to the Event Logs page, enriching the security monitoring capabilities. Completes the following request: https://github.com/HotCakeX/Harden-Windows-Security/discussions/1049

* Added support for U.S Government cloud environments. You can now sign into the app using a GCC High account and perform all of your security and management tasks in that environment. Completes the following request: https://github.com/HotCakeX/Harden-Windows-Security/discussions/1054
